number.match:
(?x)        # turn on extended mode
  -?        # an optional minus
  (?:
    0       # a zero
    |       # ...or...
    [1-9]   # a 1-9 character
    \d*     # followed by zero or more digits
  )
  (?:
    (?:
      \.    # a period
      \d+   # followed by one or more digits
    )?
    (?:
      [eE]  # an e character
      [+-]? # followed by an option +/-
      \d+   # followed by one or more digits
    )?      # make exponent optional
  )?        # make decimal portion optional
number.name: constant.numeric.rulebook
